definitions.title: vb. Hiph.
definitions.body: set, place, a vivid and forcible syn. of [[שָׂם]] (Kö:i. 430 Ges:§ 71)—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. sf. [[הִצִּיגַּ֫נִי]] Je 51:34 Qr (Kt [[החיגנו]]), Job 17:6; 1 S sf. [[הִצַּגְתִּיו]] Ge 43:9; [[וְהִצַּגְּתִּיהָ]] consec. Ho 2:5; Impf. [[וַיַּצֵּג]] Ge 30:38, Ju Jdg 8:27; sf. [[וַיַּצִּגֵם]] Ge 47:2; 2 ms. [[תַּצִּיג]] Ju Jdg 7:5, etc.; Imv. [[הַצִּ֫יגוּ]] Am 5:15; Inf. cstr. [[הַצֵּג]] De 28:56 (Ges:§ 53, 3, R. 2 Kö:1. c.); Pt. [[מַצִּיג]] Ju Jdg 6:37; —set, place, c. acc.: + [[ב]] loc. Ge 30:28 (J; + [[לְנׁכַח חאׁן]]), Ju Jdg 6:37, Jdg 8:27, 2Sa 6:17 ( + [[בְּתוֹח]]), c. [[בְּתוֹח]] in ‖ 1Ch 16:1; + [[אֵחֶל]] 1Sa 5:2; of setting foot on ([[לְ]]) ground De 28:56; Ge 33:15 (J; sq. [[עִם]]) = station with thee some of my retinue; + [[לִפְנֵי]] Ge 43:9 (J); so with idea of presenting, introducing to Ge 47:2 (J); set (so that all may see) + [[לְ]] Job 17:6; sq. 2 acc. ( = set as) Je 51:34; [[וְהִצַּגְתִּיהָ כְּיוֹם הִוׇּֽלְדָָהּ]] Ho 2:5 and (lest) I set ( = exhibit) her as in the day when she was born (‖[[אַפְשִׁיטֶנׇּה עֲרֻמָּה]]); fig. set up, establish, [[החיגר בשׁער משׂפט]] Am 5:15 (opp. v:Am 5:7 [[לארץ הניחו]]).

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יֻצָָּג]] Ex 10:24 (E) be stayed, stopped, detained (of herds, etc.)
